Name: Roman Empire vs. Barbarians
About the game: Roman Empire vs. Barbarians is a base defense game that challenges you to destroy the enemy’s base. Barbarians keep expanding all over the place and you’ve been summoned as the hero who’s going to stop them. You’re provided with a Roman Empire tower that comes with a powerful catapult and a team of warriors. Will that be enough to stop the barbarian invasion? You can easily tell that the game is pretty straightforward in the beginning. But as you progress further, it can be challenging. Features: - Pay for an army of warriors to protect your lands from the invading barbarian hordes - Collect coins and increase the capacity of your treasury - End the threat by destroying the enemy base - Play through all 50 stages - Survival mode
